Name: Brigand's Gloves
Description: The gloves dropped by Brigands are often used to create Battle Imagines.
Description$english: The gloves dropped by Brigands are often used to create Battle Imagines.
Description2$english: The gloves worn by Brigands are exceptionally sturdy and durable because they generally master a cunning weapon-holding technique. Losing their weapon often means a drastic reversal of the situation, with unimaginable consequences.
